successes.title: River City Ransom: Underground
successes.description: An officially licensed, North American follow-up to one of the most beloved RPG beat'em ups of all time.

Pledges.description: Everyone who supports the game at $5 or more will receive a digital desktop wallpaper pack, and their name engraved on the founder's wall on the project web site.
You'll receive a digital copy of the game for Windows when it is released. Regardless of distribution vehicle on launch day, you will always have a DRM-free option.

You'll receive a digital copy of the game for Windows when it is released. Regardless of distribution vehicle on launch day, you will always have a DRM-free option. You'll also get everything from the FREE SMILE AT MERV'S reward tier.

You'll receive a digital copy of the game's soundtrack. You'll also receive the soundtrack as an in-game weapon--don't tell us you've never been hit with a compact disc before, it smarts! This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You'll also get everything in the BARF! reward tier.
Identical to the BARF! rewards tier, except you get two copies of the game, one to play and one to give away.
Identical to the BARF! rewards tier, except you get four copies of the game, one to play and three to give away to your spontaneously teleported new friends!
You'll receive a digital comic book. You'll also gain access to our closed beta. Includes everything in the BARF! rewards tier.
You'll receive everything in the DISASTERPEACE reward tier, along with the map, manual, and comic book digital rewards. You'll also have access to our private beta.

You'll receive an in-game double-barreled bat on every new start. The only thing more menacing than a bat, is two bats. This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.

You'll receive an in-game, mystical-themed morning star on every new start. Now you can cause a plague o' all their houses. This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.
You'll receive everything in the WOOD STICK reward tier, along with all digital weapon skins: a double-barreled bat, a mystical morning star, and a gold-plated garbage can.

You'll receive a digital copy of the game's soundtrack. You'll also receive the soundtrack as an in-game weapon--don't tell us you've never been hit with a compact disc before, it smarts! This is a weapon skin, exclusive to Kickstarter. You will also receive a digital copy of the game, a desktop wallpaper pack, and your name on the website founder's wall.
You'll receive everything in the LEAD PIPE reward tier, along with unlocked Kunio and Riki variations for your Alex and Ryan characters.
You'll receive an exclusively designed, River City High School crest athletic tee! Your choice of English or Japanese titling and standard sizing. Includes everything in the CD CELLAR reward tier.

You'll receive a full-color, 18″ × 24″ poster of the game cover. Your choice of US/Canada or Japanese cover art variants. Add $25 to your pledge if you want both posters. Includes everything in the SCANDAL RAG reward tier.
